QuestData.Title: Secrets in the Oasis
QuestData.Description: Yes, I see the other half now, mon...to the south...$B$BWe be close now, mon. It's in an oasis, buried in de muck beneath de water. Don't delay!
QuestData.RewardText: Mazoga? He's taken the sword? That filthy...$B$B<Trenton glowers for a moment.>$B$BAt least you escaped with your life. The Lasher's bite is a vicious one.
